hp.Wiki: Amount of damage object receives before breaking. -1 = don't break normally

defense.Wiki: Threshold compared against AtkParam field atkObj. if object damage surpasses object defense, the object will take damage (needs verification)

materialId.Wiki: Material to use when this object is hit, determining visual effect and sound to use

isCamHit.Wiki: Determines if camera collides with object

isBreakByPlayerCollide.Wiki: Determines if player collision can break the object (needs verification)

isAnimBreak.Wiki: Determines if object should use an animation when broken

isPenetrationBulletHit.Wiki: If Bullet with isPenetrate will collide with the object (needs verification)

isChrHit.Wiki: Determines if characters will collide with the object and if character attacks can hit the object

isAttackBacklash.Wiki: Determines if attacks can deflect off of the object (attacks can deflect anyway if object is invincible)

isDisableBreakForFirstAppear.Wiki: Determines if the object will break when the game is loaded if the player collides with the object upon spawning

isDamageNoHit.Wiki: Unknown. Related to AtkParam field isDisableNoDamage?
